result.purpose: Responsible for handling events related to token transfers, ensuring message idempotency, and monitoring consumer performance.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, where each file handles a specific aspect of event consumption and processing.

internal/domains/antenna/consumers/block.purpose: Handles block full events and processes notifications related to token transfers.

internal/domains/antenna/consumers/idemp.purpose: Handles idempotency for processing messages using Kafka and Redis.

internal/domains/antenna/consumers/metri.purpose: Defines metrics for monitoring consumer performance in the antenna service.
